programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Keanu Reeves) turns California surfer to nab bank robbers who wear rubber masks of four ex-presidents.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man: Director's Cut
programme.desc: A scientist uses an intellectually disabled gardener as a guinea pig in his experiments with intelligence enhancing drugs and virtual reality. The man transforms into a genius, but not without side effects.

programme.title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
programme.desc: An evil corporation planning an inescapable global computer network hires a mentally impaired laborer (Matt Frewer) made into a genius by virtual reality.

programme.title: Pacific Heights
programme.desc: San Francisco yuppies (Melanie Griffith, Matthew Modine) restore a costly Victorian, then rent a studio to a landlord's nightmare (Michael Keaton).

programme.title: Sliding Doors
programme.desc: After a series of misfortunes, a woman (Gwyneth Paltrow) with an unfaithful boyfriend (John Lynch) experiences an alternate reality.

programme.title: FernGully ... the Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A lumberjack helps a tribe of rain-forest elves protect their kingdom from an evil spirit and greedy clear-cutters.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: In 1994 a 2004 Washington policeman (Jean-Claude Van Damme) saves his wife (Mia Sara) and stops a sinister senator from buying the presidency.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls
programme.desc: Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls
programme.desc: Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Living With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Troubled 9-year-old Dom has a stuffed dinosaur that comes to life.

programme.title: Body Bags
programme.desc: Filmmaker John Carpenter introduces a trio of terror tales: "Unleaded," "Hair" and Tobe Hooper's "Baseball Man."

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: Herman Melville's mad Captain Ahab spends years hunting the white whale that got his leg.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: Herman Melville's mad Captain Ahab spends years hunting the white whale that got his leg.

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: A teacher (Colin Firth), obsessed with soccer and a team that hasn't won a league cup in 18 years, begins a shaky relationship.
